reviews.text: Stoneside Blinds & Shades Plano 6860 Dallas Pkwy #200, Plano, TX 75024
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"Great communication and excellent workmanship start to finish." "Your company has to great employees who put their customers first!" "Had a great experience from ordering to installation."

Excellent service all around! Amy was amazing. She helped me find exactly what I was looking for. She was very patient taking as much time as needed. I never had to leave my house! They come to you on your schedule. Installation was also excellent. I strongly recommend them!!

Reba my designer was amazing. She really knows her stuff and made it easy for me to make a decision. Trent my install technician was great. He did a wonderful job with the installation and walk through on how to use and maintain it. Thank you Stonside. My house feels a bit more homely.

We recently had a custom shade built for our master bedroom. The team at Stoneside was absolutely amazing! John installed our shade and was so nice and sweet. Reba helped design our shade and took so much time helping us design the perfect … More
